name: Megaera
description: Megaera (Greek: Μέγαιρα) is one of the three Furies who pursue Kratos for breaking his bond with Ares, is the sister of Alecto and Tisiphone. She is the tertiary antagonist in God of War: Ascension.

biographicalInformation.status: Deceased (Stabbed in the chest by Kratos with the Blades of Chaos)
